plot: The rendezvous at a North London Tavern between a faded horror movie actor and a young woman on a mission leads to a twisted comedy of loss, lust and paranoia.
title: Chinese Burns
plot_es: The rendezvous at a North London Tavern between a faded horror movie actor and a young woman on a mission leads to a twisted comedy of loss, lust and paranoia.
plot_en: The rendezvous at a North London Tavern between a faded horror movie actor and a young woman on a mission leads to a twisted comedy of loss, lust and paranoia.
